content: I share with you the text, slides and video of my presentation "The Yoneda Embedding Expresses Whether, What, How, Why" https://www.math4wisdom.com/wiki/Research/YonedaEmbeddingFoursome I explain how the Yoneda Embedding structures four ways of looking at an arrow f:X->Y, namely, whether is f, what is f, how is f, why is f. For me, this is evidence of a deeper language of cognitive frameworks. I am curious who might be interested in such thinking. I will be attending the Applied Category Theory conference in Maryland.
